channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump expected to try to stop looming TikTok ban
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will try to prevent TikTok from getting banned in the United States, The Washington Post reported on Tuesday. During his ...

item.title: The Rivian-Volkswagen joint venture deal is now up to $5.8B
item.description: Rivian and Volkswagen Group have finalized a multi-billion-dollar joint venture to develop software, paving the way to let the German auto giant lever...

item.title: Generative disinfo is real — you’re just not the target, warns deepfake tracking nonprofit
item.description: Many feared that the 2024 election would be affected, and perhaps decided, by AI-generated disinformation. While there was some to be found, it was fa...

item.title: Kia EV3 Review: Price, Specs, Availability
item.description: The brand’s latest small SUV with a big range confirms that both EV tech and design leadership now reside in South Korea.

item.title: Oura’s Perimenopause Report Shows the Gap in Women’s Health Research
item.description: Most women don’t know what’s going to happen during perimenopause. Smart-ring manufacturers are stepping in to provide data and guidance.

item.title: Anysphere acquires Supermaven to beef up Cursor
item.description: Anysphere, the company behind AI-powered code editor Cursor, has acquired AI coding assistant Supermaven for an undisclosed sum. Anysphere CEO Michael...

item.title: TikTok is integrating with influencer shopping app LTK, videos show
item.description: An integration with LTK, an app that lets consumers shop from creator and influencers’ recommendations, is rolling out on TikTok, according to videos ...

item.title: Elon Musk Is Already Doing Exactly What He Said He Would
item.description: From sitting in on calls with foreign leaders to recommending new hires, Musk is already wielding power at Donald Trump’s side.

item.title: Best Barbecue Sauce, Rub, and Hot Sauce Subscription Boxes (2024)
item.description: Surprise yourself and light up your taste buds with new flavors every month from these highly curated subscription services.

item.title: The 32 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (November 2024)
item.description: Silo, Disclaimer, and Slow Horses are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.
